column4: considering we are doing this for kicks and free you cant actually moan
for a browser issue, I wouldn't go for a reinstall
I didn't. But apparently no one knew how to fix the issue with the download dialog box not showing up
no because that would have erased all my preferences
It doesn't erase anything, note the word RENAME
you can restore favourites from backup etc, or sync to the web and you have no issues
it creates a new profile and thus all your extentions and favourites and stuff
it was an easy fix nonetheless
yes, but the old stuff would be in the folder you renamed to, wouldn't it?
it's still a tedious task to move from one profile to another my solution was easier
I don't have that issue, I use Chrome, all synced up. Log in and the settings flow in
I'm a developer I need to know what a site looks / functions on both browsers
makes sense, I always ask when folks have multiple browsers :)
